snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored all 22 of his points in the second half, including a driving layup with 8.3 seconds remaining, as the Boston Celtics ended the Golden State Warriors' 54-game home winning streak with a 109-106 stunner on  Friday....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored all 22 of his points in the second half, including a driving layup with 8.3 seconds remaining, as the Boston Celtics ended the Golden State Warriors' 54-game home winning streak with a 109-106 stunner on  Friday.

headline.main: Celtics Hold On to End Warriors' 54-Game Home Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: Celtics Hold On to End Warriors' 54-Game Home Winning Streak
